Missing.css Version 1.0.1

§ Changelog

  • Improved menu styling on touch devices.
  • Improved alignment in .sidebar-layout.
  • Fixed a layout bug when combining .box and role=listbox.
  • Fixed a layout bug in .sidebar-layout.
  • Suffered over margins. Please ask your browser vendor to implement margin-trim.

Missing.css, by Deniz Akşimşek, funded by Big Sky Software and Commspace.

Also check out htmx and _hyperscript.

Made with 💙 in Ankara, Samsun, Rize and Cape Town.
